DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct subject psoriasis evaluate drug activity patient population analysis change psoriatic lesion biopsy characteristic . This subject population select evaluate potentially relevant biological activity CP-690,550 well assess safety pharmacokinetics .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Escalation Study In Medically Stable Subjects With Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Male and/or female subject age 18 65 year , inclusive , active psoriasis lesion ( ) . Subjects healthy exception psoriasis , healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination . Blood pressure must < 140/89 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1836 kg/m2 , inclusive ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) The following laboratory variable must 10 % low limit normal reference range : RBC , hemoglobin , hematocrit , WBC , absolute neutrophil count . The absolute lymphocyte count must great equal low limit reference range . Values AST , ALT , bilirubin alkaline phosphatase must 10 % upper limit normal reference range . Values total cholesterol LDL must 20 % upper limit normal reference range except subject treat hyperlipidemia . Normal glomerular filtration rate ( > 80 mL/min ) . Subjects evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , urological , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic disorder . Subjects control essential hypertension and/or hyperlipidemia may eligible study provide medication administer . Screening 12lead ECG demonstrate least one following : heart rate > 100 bpm , QRS > 120 msec , QTc > 430 msec ( male ) , QTc > 450 msec ( female ) PR > 220 msec . Abnormal chest radiograph include , limited , evidence past present tuberculosis infection . History tuberculosis without treatment and/or positive tuberculin reaction without know vaccination BCG . Subjects history tumor exception adequately treat basal cell carcinoma skin .
